MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA18 postcode area of Cumnock, affecting properties in James Young Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.28am. Repairs are taking longer than expected as our time are investigating an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.35am on Thursday 4th February 2021.
